SELECT DEPT_NAME AS section, devName as equip, SC_PART as part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, RESULT AS value, std_value as standard, uploadResultTime as time, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level ,
(CASE WHEN alarm_flag="N" THEN '未处理' WHEN alarm_flag="Y" THEN '已处理' END) flag FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE
(
ZONE_NAME='鼓风机' AND (devName='1#离心式鼓风机' OR devName='1#离心式鼓风机稀油站' OR devName='1#鼓风机电机' OR devName='1#鼓风机1#稀油站电机' OR devName='1#鼓风机2#稀油站电机' ) ) -- AND alarm_flag='N' AND (ALTPID = 1 OR ALTPID = 2)
AND date(uploadResultTime) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 60 DAY) ORDER BY COMPLETE_TM DESC
